Content: There is no Mobile Navigation meaning when on Mobile or any devices that are not 1080p PCs then it will not display the logo or a Navigation for the site making it hard to navigate.
It might be cool if the Logo got cartoonified to allow us to create a playful feel for the website... Do we want a playful feel for a video editing & other services company?
Please add Sam, Lily and Daisy into the Meet The Team Section with Roles and things.
